title: Buongiorno Italia! [text]
creator_credit: Alan Wilding, Maddalena Fagandini and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Accompanying student text for the audio and video programs in Italian for beginners, “Buongiorno Italia!”. Contains the text of the videos, exercises, reading passages, a key to the exercises, grammar and a glossary.
